history.proof: intros m z. unfold cA. destruct m. - reflexivity. - destruct (eq_dart_dec d z). + shelve. + destruct (eq_dart_dec d z). * shelve. * shelve. - reflexivity.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), MA0.f m z = cA m zero z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m0
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
cA0_MA0 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), cA m zero z = MA0.f m z
x0_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> cA m zero x = bottom m1 zero x
y_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> y = cA m1 zero x
expe_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m z t -> bottom m zero z = bottom m zero t
expe_top : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m z t -> top m zero z = top m zero t
McA0.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m Md0.k (cA_1 m Md0.k z) = z
McA1.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m Md1.k (cA_1 m Md1.k z) = z
not_exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA m k z = nil
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
cA_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
cA_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
cA_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
cA_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = cA m k z
cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z <> nil -> exd m z
cA_cA_1_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) j z = cA_1 m j z
bottom_B0_quad : forall (m : fmap) (z v : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m zero z -> let m0 := B m zero v in let t := Iter (MA0.f m) j z in (j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat -> ~ MA0.expo m z v -> bottom m0 zero t = bottom m zero t
cA_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cA_I : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart) (u : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> x <> z -> cA (I m x u p) k z = cA m k z
cA_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA m j z
cF_L : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> cF (L m k x y) z = (if eq_dim_dec k zero then cA_1 m one (if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then cA_1 m zero y else cA_1 m zero z) else if eq_dart_dec y (cA_1 m zero z) then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m one x) (cA_1 m zero z) then cA_1 m one y else cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z))
cA_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in cA (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = cA m k1 z
bottom_B0_bis : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m zero z -> let zi := Iter (MA0.f m) i z in let zj := Iter (MA0.f m) j z in let m0 := B m zero zi in (i < j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat -> bottom m0 zero zj = A m zero zi
bottom_B0_ter : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m zero z -> let zi := Iter (MA0.f m) i z in let zj := Iter (MA0.f m) j z in let m0 := B m zero zi in (j <= i < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat -> bottom m0 zero zj = bottom m zero zj
succ_pred_clos : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil
succ_zi : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m zero z -> (i + 1 < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat -> let zi := Iter (MA0.f m) i z in succ m zero zi
MA0.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McA0.f_1 m (McA0.f m z) = z
A_not_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> A m k x <> cA (B m k x) k x
not_succ_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k z -> B m k z = m
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
not_exd_A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A m k z = nil
not_exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> bottom m k z = nil
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z

```  
intros m z.  
unfold cA.  
unfold cA_1.  
destruct m.  
- simpl. reflexivity.  
- destruct d, d0, t.  
  destruct (eq_dart_dec d z).  
  + reflexivity.  
  + destruct (eq_dim_dec d0 zero).  
    * destruct (eq_dart_dec d z).  
      { reflexivity. }  
      { destruct (eq_dart_dec (cA_1 f d2 p0) z).  
        + reflexivity.  
        + apply a.  }  
    * apply a.  
- apply a.  
```
